(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBP have)
      (VP (VBN been)
        (VP (VBG pestering)
          (S
            (NP (NNP Xander))
            (VP (TO to)
              (VP (VB do)
                (ADVP (DT a) (IN since))
                (NP
                  (NP (DT the) (JJ first) (NN time))
                  (SBAR
                    (S
                      (NP (PRP I))
                      (VP
                        (VP (VBD ate)
                          (ADVP (RB there)))
                        (CC and)
                        (VP (VBD was)
                          (ADJP (RB very) (JJ glad)))))))))))))))


nsubj(pestering-4, I-1)
aux(pestering-4, have-2)
aux(pestering-4, been-3)
root(ROOT-0, pestering-4)
nsubj(do-7, Xander-5)
aux(do-7, to-6)
xcomp(pestering-4, do-7)
dep(since-9, a-8)
advmod(do-7, since-9)
det(time-12, the-10)
amod(time-12, first-11)
dobj(do-7, time-12)
nsubj(ate-14, I-13)
rcmod(time-12, ate-14)
advmod(ate-14, there-15)
cc(ate-14, and-16)
cop(glad-19, was-17)
advmod(glad-19, very-18)
conj(ate-14, glad-19)

    (VP (VBD decided)
      (S
        (VP (TO to)
          (VP (VB do)
            (NP (CD one))
            (PP (IN for)
              (NP (NNP Christmas)))))))
    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (VP (VB Take)
      (NP
        (NP (NN something))
        (SBAR
          (WHNP (WDT which))
          (S
            (VP (MD would)
              (VP (VB otherwise)
                (ADVP (RB So) (RB here))
                (PRN
                  (S
                    (NP (PRP you))
                    (VP (VBP are)
                      (VP (VBG !!)
                        (S
                          (VP (VBG Presenting)
                            (S
                              (NP (DT the) (CD 10) (NN course))
                              (NP (NNP Christmas) (NNP Extravaganza) (NNP Set) (NNP Dinner) (NNP Menu))))))))
                  (, ,))))))))))

aux(otherwise-5, would-4)

aux(!!-10, are-9)
parataxis(otherwise-5, !!-10)
xcomp(!!-10, Presenting-11)
det(course-14, the-12)
num(course-14, 10-13)

nn(Menu-19, Christmas-15)
nn(Menu-19, Extravaganza-16)

(ROOT
  (S
    (SBAR
      (WHNP (WDT which))
      (S
        (NP (PRP I))
        (VP (VBP feel))))
    (VP (MD should) (RB not)
      (VP (VB be)
        (VP (VBN called)
          (NP (`` ``) (NNP Degustation) ('' ''))
          (ADVP (RB anymore))
          (SBAR (IN as)
            (S
              (NP (DT the) (NNS portions))
              (VP (VBP are)
                (ADVP (RB really))
                (ADJP (RB quite) (JJ substantial))))))))
    (. !)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (NNP Xander))
    (VP (VBZ grows)
      (S
        (NP
          (NP (DT a) (NN lot))
          (PP (IN of)
            (NP (DT the) (NNS herbs))))
        (NP (PRP himself)))
      (SBAR (IN because)
        (S
          (NP
            (NP (DT some))
            (PP (IN of)
              (NP (DT these) (JJ European) (NNS herbs))))
          (VP (MD may) (RB not)
            (ADVP (RB always))
            (VP (VB be)
              (ADJP (JJ available)
                (PP (IN in)
                  (NP (DT the) (NNS Supermarkets)))))))))
    (. !)))

root(ROOT-0, grows-2)
det(lot-4, a-3)
nsubj(himself-8, lot-4)
prep(lot-4, of-5)
det(herbs-7, the-6)
pobj(of-5, herbs-7)
xcomp(grows-2, himself-8)
mark(available-19, because-9)
nsubj(available-19, some-10)
prep(some-10, of-11)
det(herbs-14, these-12)
amod(herbs-14, European-13)
pobj(of-11, herbs-14)
aux(available-19, may-15)
neg(available-19, not-16)

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (DT The) (NN menu))
    (VP
      (VP (VBZ is)
        (ADJP (RB only) (JJ valid)
          (PP (IN from)
            (NP (CD 20-24))))
        (NP (NNP Dec)))
      (CC and)
      (VP (VBZ is)
        (PP (IN by)
          (NP (NNS reservations) (RB only)))))
    (. .)))


det(menu-2, The-1)
nsubj(valid-5, menu-2)
cop(valid-5, is-3)
advmod(valid-5, only-4)
root(ROOT-0, valid-5)
prep(valid-5, from-6)
pobj(from-6, 20-24-7)
attr(valid-5, Dec-8)
cc(valid-5, and-9)
conj(valid-5, is-10)
prep(is-10, by-11)
pobj(by-11, reservations-12)
advmod(reservations-12, only-13)


(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (ADVP (RB Hopefully))
    (SBAR (IN if)
      (S
        (NP (DT this) (NN concept))
        (VP (VBZ works))
        (, ,)))))


root(ROOT-0, Hopefully-1)
mark(works-5, if-2)
det(concept-4, this-3)
nsubj(works-5, concept-4)
dep(Hopefully-1, works-5)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (NNP Xander))
    (VP (MD might)
      (VP (VB offer)
        (NP
          (NP (DT this) (NN type))
          (PP (IN of)
            (NP (NN menu))))
        (PP (IN on)
          (NP (DT a)
            (ADJP (RBR more) (JJ permanent))
            (NN basis)))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(offer-3, Xander-1)
aux(offer-3, might-2)
root(ROOT-0, offer-3)
det(type-5, this-4)
dobj(offer-3, type-5)
prep(type-5, of-6)
pobj(of-6, menu-7)
prep(offer-3, on-8)
det(basis-12, a-9)
advmod(permanent-11, more-10)
amod(basis-12, permanent-11)
pobj(on-8, basis-12)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (ADVP (RB certainly))
    (VP (VBP hope)
      (SBAR
        (S
          (NP (PRP he))
          (VP (MD would)))))
    (. !)))


nsubj(hope-3, I-1)
advmod(hope-3, certainly-2)
root(ROOT-0, hope-3)
nsubj(would-5, he-4)
ccomp(hope-3, would-5)
